name: Square One (Tarnav)
description:
Square One

The goal of the game is very simple. Just reach the end of the road.  And while I admit it won't be easy getting there,  the journey is always the best part.

I must warn you of 2 things though. 

Firstly, If you get too frustrated and quit the game, you will have to start your journey from Square One all over again.  Secondly, All your actions are being watched.... Fail enough times and the game itself will start to insult you in sheer disbelief of your lack of skills.  Think you can handle it?

My aim for this game was to provide a short and rewarding player experience. As long as you feel relief and satisfaction when you finish the game, my work was worth it.
